alert.note: Alert for Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 6:17PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Bannock and south central Bingham Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 617 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fort Hall Townsite, or 10 miles north of Pocatello, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Western Pocatello, Chubbuck, Fort Hall Buffalo Lodge, Fort Hall Townsite, Fort Hall Mount Putnam, Fort Hall Eagle Lodge, and Fort Hall Putnam Lodge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands
